channel.title: Mastery on Code Chauffeur
channel.description: Recent content in Mastery on Code Chauffeur

item.title: A Simple Road Map to Learn New Frameworks
item.description: It’s 2020, there are lots of things to learn as a software developer. Your ability to learn fast sets you apart. One of the best things about modern software development is the availability of free tools and frameworks. For example, as a frontend developer there’s a lot of frontend frameworks you can use: React, Vue, Angular, Emberjs, Backbonejs, and many more. This can also be a challenge in terms of what to use.
